text: Hello everyone, hope you're well. I'm very new to HubSpot. I'm trying to host a json file on my main domain for it to be scrawlable by 3rd party (for compliance purpose) but don't know how to proceed via HubSpot Would anyone be able to help me?  Thank you in advance :pray:
Upload it in on "Files", then select it and on "File URL by domain" select your domain and click "Copy URL"

This. If it needs to be in a root folder, you can then set up a redirect in the settings tool to redirect from the <https://www.example.com/example.json> location to the actual file URL; that’s worked for me in the past
^ Yep - and you can actually do it as a proxy redirect type too so that the content is served via the URL expected but the output is actually coming from another URI.
